review_data.title: Excellent restaurant
review_data.content: I was surprised to learn that this old traditional Zunfthaus has just re-opened after being destroyed by a fire. The old wooden carvings, alabaster ceilings and decorated windows have been recreated. Excellent food and superb service, all in a magnificent ambience.
